title: 我的世界正版邮箱怎样修改？
author: l小魂l
txt_content: 我在修改的时候显示Error! Request denied. To get help with changing your e-mail address visit our Support Center. When contacting customer support, make sure that you include your game purchase transaction ID.能不能给我截图教程？？傻瓜试的那种

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xmdhs 于 2019-10-28 19:00 编辑 
l小魂l 发表于 2019-10-28 18:33
能给我说一下页面要怎么填吗？
我翻译插件罢工了
随便点点就行。。都是很简单的英文。

这个位置这样填





file_1572260194000.jpg (186.87 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-10-28 18:56 上传






内容我都帮你写好了，只是应该有语法问题，但是问题不大吧。
I want change my account email, but your website was not allowed. It print "Error! Request denied. To get help with changing your e-mail address visit our Support Center. When contacting customer support, make sure that you include your game purchase transaction ID."

So I want change my email, thanks.

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
这个拒绝你的更改邮箱的请求，得拿交易id去来这去更改 https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/requests/new

所以还不如不改

replies.txt_content:
l小魂l 发表于 2019-10-28 19:06
交易ID是我的邮箱地址吗？
买完这个游戏之后，会发一封邮件，里面有写交易id

replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-10-28 19:08
买完这个游戏之后，会发一封邮件，里面有写交易id
我这边没有给我发
是验证码吗？
